data.name: Evacuation Combat
data.detailed_description:
Summary

3D space werewolf killing, two evil demons incarnate into human beings and hide among you, and one just demon also clings to someone and silently protects human beings. We have to finish the mission before the demons wipe out humans, evacuate from this polluted space station, or take the lead to wipe out all demons. But can you tell who the devil is and who the devil is? Don't forget, there is a villain with evil nature lurking among human beings. It's your mission to use your brain and tools to survive.

Describe

Human goals
1. Win by completing all tasks in the game scene, and collect ammunition and medical kits by completing some tasks.
2. Be careful! Everyone around you may be demons or villains. Pay attention to their movements and behaviors, unite with human beings to kill exposed demons and villains, and pay attention not to kill demons by mistake, otherwise human beings will lose important combat power.
3. If you have some important information, go back to the dormancy module in time to open the meeting, and exchange information with you to determine the next tactics.
4. You can go to the monitoring room to collect information.

Villain target
1. Find a chance to kill human beings before all tasks are completed. Be careful not to expose yourself!
2. Observe carefully, analyze the devil, and use all means to avoid the devil's exposure.
3. Disturb the situation and induce human beings to attack demons.
4. Kill other humans and win.

Demon target
1. Kill all normal humans in the game to win.
2. When killing people, pay attention to your surroundings and be careful not to be found.
3. Demons and villains can destroy some equipment in the power cabin and activate the alarm. If the meeting cannot be opened at this time, the space station will fall into darkness, and the success rate of assassination is higher at this time.
4. Escape from the scene as soon as possible after killing and destroying equipment to reduce suspicion.
5. Even if you are found, you should try every means to excuse yourself in the meeting.
6. Don't expose yourself too early, or you will have the same combat power as human beings when you cool down. You may get the Bento in an instant.

Demon target
1. Complete all tasks or kill all demons before all humans die to win.
2. Don't try to kill easily, it's better to carry out the action after obtaining human trust.
3. Demons and villains will try their best to kill themselves. They must keep a low profile and wait for a good opportunity to kill the people.
4. Don't change your body too early. Protecting human beings is your primary goal.

Game features
1. Fighting
It can be divided into melee and firearms. The melee damage of ordinary human is lower, and the melee damage is increased after demons or demons transform; At present, there is only one mk-34 pistol with three kinds of ammunition:
(in game tab switch ammunition)
① Laser bullet: the most damage
② Decelerator: the lowest damage, but can reduce the movement speed of hit units
③ Poison bomb: medium damage, can make hit units receive continuous damage.
2. Meetings
The meeting is different from the werewolf game. It can be opened at any time in a non emergency state. Players can choose to speak freely. However, the game time still flows. So players on the human side should discuss the game strategy concisely, accurately and clearly. Players on the demon side should delay the time of human players and hinder their judgment without being doubted.
What's more, it's very important that the conference can't be a vote maker. It's just a medium to help human players communicate. Your survival depends largely on whether you can formulate feasible strategies and fully implement them.
3. Monitoring
The monitoring room and the terminal can interact to view the monitoring camera, which can collect information in this way. It is worth noting that the camera being viewed will emit red light, so the demon side needs to pay attention before killing.
4. Task system
By completing the task of the weapon cabin, you can get the ammunition package, I key to open the backpack and click to get the corresponding ammunition; After completing the task of medical cabin, you can get the medical package. The use method is the same as above.
5. Damage the equipment
Some equipment in the power cabin can be damaged by demons and villains. When entering the emergency state, an alarm will be given and the meeting can not be opened. At this time, the human side can not communicate. It is a good time for demons to hunt and kill. Of course, anyone can also repair the equipment and get out of the emergency state.

data.short_description: A 3D werewolf kill class game, 2 evil demons incarnate into human beings, hidden in the 8 crew, a just demon also attached to someone, silently protect human beings. We have to survive, complete the mission, evacuate from the contaminated space station, or take the lead in destroying all the demons.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS:
  • Processor:
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics:
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
  • Sound Card:
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS:
  • Processor:
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics:
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
  • Sound Card:
